title: Stage Lv5-A1-S01
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The purpose of this study appears to be to investigate the relationship between variables. (academic variant 1)
We have formulated the following hypothesis. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 연구의 목적은 변수 간의 관계를 조사하는 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The purpose of this study appears to be to investigate the relationship between variables. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 우리는 다음과 같은 가설을 설정했습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We have formulated the following hypothesis. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이론적 근거에 바탕하여 가정을 제시합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Based on theoretical foundations, we present the following assumptions. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 실증적 데이터를 통해 검증하고자 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We aim to verify this through empirical data. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 방법론이 결과의 신뢰성을 보장할 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The research methodology is likely to ensure the reliability of results. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 선행 연구에서 다루지 않은 측면을 탐구합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We explore aspects not addressed in previous studies. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 가설이 입증된다면 이론에 기여할 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: If this hypothesis appears to be proven, it is likely to contribute to the theory. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 목표는 실용적 함의를 도출하는 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The research objective appears to be to derive practical implications. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 분석 틀을 통해 현상을 체계적으로 접근합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We approach the phenomenon systematically through an analytical framework. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 연구가 학계에 새로운 통찰을 제공할 것입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: This research is likely to provide new insights to the academic community. (academic variant 1)

sentences.en: The purpose of this study appears to be to investigate the relationship between variables. (academic variant 2)
